name: The Monetary Matters Network
title: Violent Correction Imminent Before Stock Market Mania Resumes, Argues Mel Mattison
text:
Synopsis
Mel Mattison anticipates a volatile 2025 for the stock market, with a potential 10-30% correction followed by a recovery, ultimately projecting the S&P 500 could reach 15,000 by early 2029 through a potential monetary reset and economic restructuring.

Key Insights
- Predicts a significant market correction of 10-30% in the first half of 2025
- Expects a V-shaped recovery after the correction
- Forecasts S&P 500 could reach 7,000 by end of 2025
- Anticipates a potential "Bretton Woods 2.0" monetary reset
- Believes the reset could involve:
  - Yield curve control
  - Debt forgiveness program
  - Potential move away from US dollar as primary reserve currency
- Suggests potential involvement of Scott Bessent as Treasury Secretary in designing monetary reset
- Sees potential for inflation in the 3-6% range
- Believes long-term S&P 500 could reach 15,000 by early 2029
- Highlights risks of current deficit spending and unsustainable debt levels
- Mentions potential role of gold revaluation and long-term bond issuance in monetary reset
- Sees Bitcoin as a potential small component of future reserve assets
- Expects significant economic policy changes under a potential Trump administration
